Interface IShard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShardImpl

    • Method Detail

      • getClient

        IDiscordClient getClient()
        Gets the client this shard is managed by.
        Returns:
        The client.

      • getInfo

        int[] getInfo()
        Gets the sharding information for this shard. Index 0 is the current shard number and index 1 is the total number of shards.
        Returns:
        The sharding information.

      • login

        void login()
    throws DiscordException
        Connects this shard to the Discord gateway.
        Throws:
        DiscordException

      • logout

        void logout()
     throws DiscordException
        Disconnects this shard from the Discord gateway.
        Throws:
        DiscordException

      • isReady

        boolean isReady()
        Checks if the api is ready to be interacted with. This means all available guilds on this shard have been received.
        Returns:
        True if ready, false if otherwise.

      • isLoggedIn

        boolean isLoggedIn()
        Checks if the api has established a connection with the Discord gateway. This means the Ready payload has been received. Note: This is most likely only useful to advanced users.
        Returns:
        True if logged in, false if otherwise.

      • getResponseTime

        long getResponseTime()
        Gets the last time it took for Discord to acknowledge a heartbeat.
        Returns:
        The time it took.

      • changePresence

        void changePresence(boolean isIdle)
        Changes this user's presence.
        Parameters:
        isIdle - If true, this user becomes idle, or online if false.

      • changeStatus

        void changeStatus(Status status)
        Changes the status of the bot user.
        Parameters:
        status - The new status to use.

      • getChannels

        List<IChannel> getChannels(boolean includePrivate)
        Gets a set of all channels visible to this shard.
        Parameters:
        includePrivate - Whether to include private channels in the set.
        Returns:
        A Collection of all Channel objects.

      • getChannels

        List<IChannel> getChannels()
        Gets a set of all channels visible to this shard.
        Returns:
        A Collection of all non-private Channel objects.

      • getChannelByID

        IChannel getChannelByID(String channelID)
        Gets a channel by its unique id.
        Parameters:
        channelID - The id of the desired channel.
        Returns:
        The Channel object with the provided id.

      • getVoiceChannels

        List<IVoiceChannel> getVoiceChannels()
        Gets a set of all voice channels visible to this shard.
        Returns:
        A Collection of all VoiceChannel objects.

      • getConnectedVoiceChannels

        List<IVoiceChannel> getConnectedVoiceChannels()
        Gets the connected voice channels on this shard.
        Returns:
        The voice channels.

      • getVoiceChannelByID

        IVoiceChannel getVoiceChannelByID(String id)
        Gets a voice channel from a given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The voice channel id.
        Returns:
        The voice channel (or null if not found).

      • getGuilds

        List<IGuild> getGuilds()
        Gets a set of all guilds visible to this shard.
        Returns:
        The list of Guilds the api is connected to.

      • getGuildByID

        IGuild getGuildByID(String guildID)
        Gets a guild by its unique id.
        Parameters:
        guildID - The id of the desired guild.
        Returns:
        The Guild object with the provided id.

      • getUsers

        List<IUser> getUsers()
        Gets a set of all users visible to this shard.
        Returns:
        A Collection of all User objects.

        IUser getUserByID(String userID)
        Gets a user by its unique id.
        Parameters:
        userID - The id of the desired user.
        Returns:
        The User object with the provided id.

        List<IRole> getRoles()
        Gets a set of all roles visible to this shard.
        Returns:

        Gets a role by its unique id.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The Role object

      • getMessages

        List<IMessage> getMessages(boolean includePrivate)
        This gets all messages stored in this shard's cache.
        Parameters:
        includePrivate - Whether to include private messages or not.
        Returns:
        A collection of all messages.

      • getMessages

        List<IMessage> getMessages()
        This gets all messages stored in this shard's cache. (including from private channels).
        Returns:
        A collection of all messages.

      • getMessageByID

        IMessage getMessageByID(String messageID)
        This attempts to search all guilds/private channels visible to this shard for a message.
        Parameters:
        messageID - The message id of the message to find.
        Returns:
        The message or null if not found.

      • getOrCreatePMChannel

        IPrivateChannel getOrCreatePMChannel(IUser user)
                              throws DiscordException,
                                     RateLimitException
        Gets a IPrivateChannel for the provided recipient.
        Parameters:
        user - The user who will be the recipient of the private channel.
        Returns:
        The IPrivateChannel object.
        Throws:
        DiscordException
        RateLimitException
